description:
The perfect combination of comfort and durability. Made of soft, supple yak leather, the Tashi is mountain boot built for kilometre after kilometre. The double-stitched upper is constructed using complex handcrafted workmanship using high-quality materials. And should it eventually show signs of wear after numerous adventures, the seams can be easily repaired and the stable, sure-grip Vibram® sole is easy to replace.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Tashi - Mens
